verses.text: Mamin Jehová, colonh, yujto manhxalaj eb' ay elk'och t'a sat, van satel eb' tzach k'anab'ajan t'a skal eb' anima.
Syesej eb' t'ay junjun. D'a chab'satil slolon eb' t'ay junjun yic slaj yixtan sb'a eb'.
Mamin Jehová, satcanel juntzanh anima ayoch t'a chab'satil chi' yet' eb' syik'chaanh sb'a.
Aton eb' tz'alani: Anhej tato syal co loloni, k'ocb'ilnhej chi'. Ha co ti' tik ol onh colanoc. ¿Machto val ol yal onh schecani? xchi eb'.
Axo Jehová tz'alani: Tz'ixtaj val eb' malaj tas syal yuj. Ha eb' meb'a' tz'el yav eb' yuj syail. Yuj chi', yovalil ol in colcanel eb' stanhvan in colval, xchi Jehová.
Ha tas yalnaccan Jehová te wach'nhej. Icha val q'uen plata sik'lab'il stz'ai, manhxalaj jab'oc smical, uquel snhusji t'a yol k'ak', icha chi' yaj tas yalnaccani.
Mamin Jehová, a ach ton val tzonh a tanhvej. Toxonton tzonh a colnhej t'a juntzanh anima tik.
Ayic schaan yab' chucal eb' anima, masanil b'aj tz'ik'jichaanh eb' chuc chi'.
